protein.specific_function: The natural substrate for this enzyme may be peptidyl-tRNAs which drop off the ribosome during protein synthesis (By similarity). Promotes caspase-independent apoptosis by regulating the function of two transcriptional regulators, AES and TLE1.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds

reference.reference_text: Lai CH, Chou CY, Ch'ang LY, Liu CS, Lin W: Identification of novel human genes evolutionarily conserved in Caenorhabditis elegans by comparative proteomics. Genome Res. 2000 May;10(5):703-13.
